edge: In 1992, five-year-old Jamal obtained the autograph of Bollywood star Amitabh Bachchan after jumping into a cesspit.
Jamal's elder brother Salim later sells the autograph obtained by Jamal in 1992.
The brothers and Latika are found by Maman, a gangster who trains street children to become beggars.
In the flashbacks, we see that Salim is Jamal's elder brother.
The brothers refer to themselves as Athos and Porthos but do not know the third musketeer's name. Latika is their 'third musketeer'.
In the flashbacks, we learn that Maman blinded street children to make them more effective beggars.
Salim and Jamal escape from Maman's gang with Latika's help.
In the flashbacks, we see that Latika met Jamal and his brother Salim in their slum.
During the Bombay riots, while fleeing the riots, the brothers briefly encounter a child dressed up as Rama, with a bow and arrow in their right hand.
The memory of this encounter helps Jamal answer one of the questions on Kaun Banega Crorepati.

close sibling relationship, Salim and Latika grow up together in poverty, escape from Maman's capture but Salim leaves Latika behind out of revenge, reunite briefly but Salim becomes a high-ranking lieutenant in Javed's crime organisation
close sibling relationship, escape from Maman's capture together, travel on top of trains and work together to make a living, Salim orders Jamal to leave him alone with Latika but Jamal refuses
close childhood friends, reunite briefly but Salim scars Latika's face while driving away, Jamal becomes a contestant on Kaun Banega Crorepati to find Latika
works for Javed's crime organisation as a high-ranking lieutenant
raises Latika to be a prostitute after she is recaptured
Initially, Jamal scars Latika's face while driving away. Later, Jamal becomes a contestant on Kaun Banega Crorepati in a final attempt to reach her.
As a contestant on the show, Jamal becomes popular across India.
During the final episode, Kumar attempts to trick Jamal by feeding him the wrong answer to the penultimate question.
Salim gives Latika his phone and car keys, asking her to forgive him.
After Latika leaves, Salim fills a bathtub with money and sits in it.
Feeling guilty about his past behavior, Salim gives Latika his phone and car keys, asking her to forgive him. Later, she realizes that Salim betrayed Javed.
In the final episode, Jamal calls Salim because it is the only phone number he knows. Relieved about Latika, Jamal picks the first answer and guesses correctly.
After hearing Latika on the show, Javed realizes that Salim betrayed him. He and his men break down the bathroom door.
In the final episode, Salim kills Javed before getting shot and killed by the gang.
Jamal and Latika meet on the platform at the train station, kiss, and dance to the song "Jai Ho" along with all the other characters.
Jamal guesses and picks the first answer, Aramis, to win the grand prize.
Kills Javed before getting shot and killed by the gang.
Shot and killed Latika's brother, Javed.
